value:
$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Nino...stay here. I will eliminate
the enemy.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|But, Jaffar! Are these people really
and truly bad? Maybe if we try to
talk to them first...$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|$w0|If talk fails, we are as good as dead.
Too dangerous.$k$pI must keep you safe. I will
exterminate all of them...$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You...don't intend to kill us?$k$pI live only to protect Nino. And
now you...$k$pYou are sparing us....Nino...
and me. Hmm.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Jaffar! You're all right! Please,
let's go home. Just the two of us,
friends, forever and ever!$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The two of us. Forever...and ever.$k$pYou people...I am in your debt.
I repay my debts.$k$pEvery moment Nino is with me is
a moment more than before. It
gives my life...life.$k$pYou have our thanks.$k

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|That completes our mission.
We should head back to the
castle, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait, wait! Please, sir, you with the
blue hair! Is your name Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes, but how do you know who
I am?$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I met a man recently...called
Zacharias, I think? He said you
might be coming through here.$k$pHe told me to give you this letter.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|A letter—from Zacharias?! Please,
give it to me!$k$pTh-thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, you're welcome. Glad to get
it to the right person. Hope we
meet again sometime.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Come on! What does it say?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Patience, Sharena. Here now,
here it is...$k$p"Alfonse, you must be worried
about where I've gone to. Sorry,
but all this was necessary."$k$p"I stumbled upon a secret about the
Emblian Empire's royal family..."$k$p"I needed to see whether it was true
or not. I am still investigating. But
know this for now..."$k$p"Veronica is not our enemy. The
true villain is Bruno."$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Who? Bruno? I've never heard of
him.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|The royal family of Embla is a web
of relations, too complex for most
to even begin to follow...$k$pBut I think I've heard about a Bruno
in their family—a prince who few
have ever seen before.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|So Zacharias is trying to find out
more about this Prince Bruno?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|It seems so. He does have the skills
to slip into Embla and investigate
such things in hiding...$k$pOf all of us, he'd be the best at
infiltrating the empire, but what a
lapse of judgment not to tell us.$k$pI'm his commander, after all, so he
must have known I would consider
this a serious offense.$k$pBut knowing Zacharias, I have to
believe he'd have good reason
to do all of this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Who knows what's happened to him?
Maybe he's been taken prisoner
by now.$k$pThough how then did he get us this
letter?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|It's just good to know he's alive.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I only hope that he'll make his way
back to us somehow. He has much
to explain.$k$pThis letter at least is something to
go by for now—a little hope when
before we had almost none.$k$p
